mapper.sql: SELECT SEQ, CATEGORY, TITLE, VIEW_CNT, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(A.UPDATE_DATE,A.CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') CREATE_DATE, B.DD_VALUE CATEGORY_NAME, IF(DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_DATE, '%y.%m.%d') = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%y.%m.%d'),'Y','N') IS_NEW, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 ROWNUM FROM BOARD_FAQ A LEFT OUTER JOIN CODE B ON A.CATEGORY = B.DD_KEY AND B.DD_MAIN = 'FAQ', (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) NUM WHERE 1 = 1 AND CATEGORY LIKE CONCAT('%',#{category},'%') AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{findString},'%') ORDER BY SEQ
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, CATEGORY, TITLE, CONTENTS, VIEW_CNT, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(A.UPDATE_DATE,A.CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') CREATE_DATE, B.DD_VALUE CATEGORY_NAME FROM BOARD_FAQ A LEFT OUTER JOIN CODE B ON A.CATEGORY = B.DD_KEY AND B.DD_MAIN = 'FAQ' WHERE A.SEQ = #{seq}
UPDATE BOARD_FAQ SET CATEGORY = #{category}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE SEQ = #{seq}

SELECT PAGE.* FROM ( SELECT DATA.* FROM ( SELECT SEQ, CATEGORY, TITLE, VIEW_CNT, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(A.UPDATE_DATE,A.CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') CREATE_DATE, B.DD_VALUE CATEGORY_NAME, IF(DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_DATE, '%y.%m.%d') = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%y.%m.%d'),'Y','N') IS_NEW, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 ROWNUM FROM BOARD_FAQ A LEFT OUTER JOIN CODE B ON A.CATEGORY = B.DD_KEY AND B.DD_MAIN = 'FAQ', (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) NUM WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY VIEW_CNT DESC ) DATA ) PAGE LIMIT 1,6
